Module pipeline
Package tcpassos.pipeline

Interface Pipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>

Type Parameters:
BEGIN - Input element type of the pipeline
END - Output element type of the pipeline
Enclosing interface:
Pipeline<BEGIN,END>
public static interface Pipeline.Builder<BEGIN,END>
Builder with methods to add stages to the pipeline
